name: 林文印
objective:
人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。
人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。
AI tools can provide many benefits in the field of environmental engineering and management, and one of the main advantages of using AI tools is their ability to effectively analyze and process large amounts of data. The complexity of environmental data is a challenging obstacle, and AI provides more accurate predictions, continuous monitoring, risk assessment, and problem solving. This course will briefly introduce the development of AI technology, as well as application cases in the fields of AI-related Internet of Things, environmental monitoring, environmental quality prediction, environmental research, etc., as well as
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. 機器學習概念與介紹
3. Python 語言基礎學習 I
4. Python 語言基礎學習 II
5. Python 語言進行機器學習應用 I
6. Python 語言進行機器學習應用 I
7. History and Current Status of Artificial Intelligence Development
8. Ethics and Morality of AI Development
9. Deep Learning and the Foundations of Natural Language
10. Midterm Report
11. Characteristics and Challenges of Environmental Data
12. Pre-processing of Environmental Data
13. Statistical Analysis and Visualization
14. Spatial and Temporal Data Analysis
15. Environmental Sensors and Internet of Things (IoT)
16. Pollution Monitoring, Prediction, and Pollution Source Tracking
17. AI Applications in Resource Recovery
18. Final Report
scorePolicy:
1. Class Attendance and Participation 30%
2. Midterm Report 30%
3. Final Report 40%
materials:
1. Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach 4/E (Stuart Russell and Peter Norvig)
2. Artificial Intelligence Methods in the Environmental Sciences (Sue Ellen Haupt, Antonello Pasini  and Caren Marzban)
consultation: Please email Professor Lin (wylin@ntut.edu.tw) to discuss or arrange meeting.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG6：潔淨水與衛生（Clean Water and Sanitation）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
